Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Ave Maria — two couplets inserted in the Speculum Sacerdotale

BodRawA362.Transcription:
Heyle Marye wele þe befful of grace and god wiþ
                    þeeAmonge alle wymmen blyssed þou beand þe fruyte
                    þat comeþ of þe

BLAdd36791.Transcription:
Hayle mare wele the beffull of grace god is with theAmonge alle
                    wymen blessy thow beAnd the fruyt that cometh of the
BLAdd36791.Editions:
Weatherly,  Edward Howell,
                        ed.  
             Speculum Sacerdotale.
EETS
         o.s. 200 (1936); repr. Kraus: New York, 1971: 40.
